testimonials.description: A list of testimonials and their associated authors
testimonials.instructions: Use available information to create 3 or 6 testimonials in the testimonials array. Use the provided icon for all authors. Do not use Yelp reviews.

example.body: The body for the first testimonial goes here. It should be a short paragraph about what the person is saying about the company.

author.name: Name of the first person
author.source: Source of the review. For example, Google, Facebook, etc.
